es.ubu.alu

Class TCPCommandSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ubu.alu.TCPCommandSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandSender

    public class TCPCommandSender
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommandSender
    Implements the functions for each operation available in the remote board.

    The commands are sent inside packets through the network using Transmission Control Protocol (TCP). To achieve this, it is necessary to know the IP address and the port of the board that will receive the package.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    RPC

      • adjustsPWM

        public void adjustsPWM(CommandSender.PWMDevice pwmDevice,
                       byte percentage)
        Description copied from interface: CommandSender
        Send the command to adjust the duty cycle of the indicated device.

        The duty cycle is changed to the given percentage. Being 0 the minimum value, turning the device off. Or being 100 the maximum value, putting the device at maximum duty.

        Specified by:
        adjustsPWM in interface CommandSender
        Parameters:
        pwmDevice - the device to adjust.
        percentage - the new duty cycle.
